take towel  down from the towel rack
turn around, walk towards the toilet
put the towel on the back of the toilet

take the towel from the towel ring
turn to the right and go to the door and turn to the right and go to the toilet

Grab the towel from the wall.
Turn right, then turn right again and walk to the toilet.
Place the towel on top of the toilet paper.

Turn around and stand in front of the toilet.
Put the towel on the back of the toilet.

take the towel from the hook
turn around and carry the towel to the toilet
place the towel on the tank of the toilet on the right side

high_descs: turn around and look down at the table
pick up the candle off of the table
turn around and walk straight then turn left and walk straight then turn left again and walk straight towards the table
open the drawer on the right side of the table and put the candle inside and close the drawer
turn right and walk straight then turn left and walk towards the table
pick up the candle at the back of the table
turn around and walk straight then turn right then right again and walk straight towards the table
open the drawer and put the candle inside and close the drawer

high_descs: Walk across the room to the sink.
Pick up the soap on the edge of the sink.
Go to the left side of the sink.
Get the soap wet in the sink.
Take the wet soap across the room to the toilet.
Set the wet soap on the back of the toilet .
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the sink to the right of the bath tub
Pick up the bar of soap from the sink
Move to the other side of the sink
Put soap into the sink and let the water run a moment before turning off the water and picking the soap back up
Move to the toilet to the left of the counter
Place the soap on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet bar of soap on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Walk over to the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap next to the faucet on the sink.
Turn left and walk to the left side of the sink then face the sink.
Place the bar of soap in the sink and rinse it before picking it back up.
Turn to the right and walk to the toilet in the corner.
Place the soap on top of the toilet to the right of the yellow bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the left side of the cabinet by the toilet
Pick up the bar of soap from the top of the cabinet
Turn around and walk to the bathroom sink
Rinse the soap bar under water in the sink
Turn around and carry the soap bar over to the toilet
Put the soap down on top of the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Put the cleaned soap on the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap on top of the toilet tank.
Turn around and go forward to the sink.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Turn around and walk back to the toilet.
Put the bar of soap on top of the toilet tank to the right of the other objects.

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk forward to face toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and walk across the room to face the sink on the right.
Wash the soap in the sink and pick it back up.
Turn around and walk to the left across the room to face the toilet.
Place the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left towards the dresser.
Pick up the bar soap on the dresser.
Turn right, walk to the bath tub, and turn right towards the sink.
Wash the bar soap in the sink and pick it back up.
Turn around and walk towards the toilet.
Place the bar soap on the toilet basin.
tasks.task_desc: Placed the cleaned bar soap on the toilet basin.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Grab the soap on top of the toilet tank.
Turn right, walk to the tub, make another right and walk to the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, turn on the faucet, turn off the faucet, and then grab the soap.
Turn around and walk back to the toilet.
Place the soap back on the toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn left and face in between the toilet and counter.
Grab the soap off of the top of the toilet.
Turn around and head to the sink.
Rinse off the soap in the sink.
Turn right and take the soap back to the toilet.
Place it on top of the toilet where it was retrieved from.

high_descs: Turn around, then turn left and walk to the bath tub.
Grab the bar of soap in the bath tub.
Turn right and walk forward, then turn left towards the sink.

Grab the bar of soap, turn right, then turn left to walk across the room, turn right and walk to the toilet.
Place the bar of soap on top of the toilet.

Turn around and walk over to the sink
Rinse the soap under water of the sink
Turn around and carry the soap bar over to the toilet
Put the soap bar down on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Move to stand in front of the bath tub.

Carry the soap to the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, turn on the water, and remove once it's wet.
Carry the soap to stand in front of the toilet.
Place the soap on the lid of the toilet's tank at the end closest to the flush lever.

Bring the soap to the sink on the right.

Bring the soap to the toilet back in the corner.

Place the soap in the sink and turn on the water to rinse and turn back off, pick back up the soap
Turn around and walk towards the toilet
Put the soap on top of the toilet

grab the pink bar in the tub

put the bar in the sink, wash the bar with water, take the bar out

put the pink bar on the toilet

open drawer, place cloth in drawer

Open the drawer and place the wash rag behind the one that is in there.

Place the rag in the top cabinet underneath the bar of soap.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag in a cabinet.

high_descs: Make a left and walk to the bathtub.
Pick the pink rag on the right inside the bathtub.
Turn around to walk towards the sink.
Rinse the pink rag in the sink, removing it again.
Turn around to walk towards the dresser.
Put the pink rag in the left-most lower drawer of the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a pink rag and put it in the dresser.

high_descs: Turn right and walk over to the bathtub
Pick up the right most pink cloth from the bathtub
Turn around right and walk up to the side of the sink
Wash the cloth under water in the sink then remove it
Turn right and walk over to the cabinet with drawers
Open the top drawer second from the left and put the cloth in it
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed pink cloth in the drawer

high_descs: TUrn right and walk across the room to face the bath tub.
Pick up the dirty rag on the left of the bath tub.
Turn right to face the sink.
Wash the dirty rag in the sink and remove it.
Turn around to face the dresser.
Place the clean rag in the second cabinet from the left of the top row of the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: To clean a rag and place it  in the second cabinet from the left of the top row of the dresser.

high_descs: Turn left and take one step forward then turn right to face the bathtub.
Pick up the sponge from the side of the bathtub.
Turn around and walk to the left side of the sink.
Put the sponge in the sink, wash it off, then pick it up.
Turn around and walk to the counter on the other side of the room.
Put the sponge in the top second from the left drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean sponge in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn and go to the bathtub.
Pick up a sponge on the bathtub.
Turn and go to the sink.
Wash the sponge in the sink.
Turn and go to the chest of drawers.
Put the sponge in a drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed sponge in a drawer.

high_descs: Move to the left.
Pick up the sponge on the side of the tub.
Turn around and walk toward the sink.
Put sponge in the sink and turn on the water.  Empty sink and pick up the sponge.
Turn right and walk toward cabinet on the other side of the room.  Open up drawer on top left.
Put sponge in drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse sponge and put in cabinet drawer.

high_descs: Move to the toilet on the left.
Pick up the sponge on the toilet.
Bring the the sponge to the sink behind you to the right.
Wash the sponge in the sink.
Take the sponge to the counter of drawers opposite the sink.
Put the washed sponge in the top left drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed sponge in the top left drawer.

high_descs: Go to the toilet in front of you.
Pick up the sponge from the back of the toilet.
Turn right and go forward to the tab, then turn right and go to the wall, then turn right to face the sink.
Wash the sponge in the sink.
Turn right and walk to the drawers ahead.
Put the sponge in the top left drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean sponge in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the wall, then turn to your right and get as close to the back of the toilet as you can.
Pick up the green sponge on the back of the toilet.
Turn to your right and walk to the bath tub, then turn right and go across the room to the sink.
Place the sponge in the sink, turn the water on, rinse the sponge out, turn the water off, and remove the sponge from the sink.
Turn around and go across the bathroom to the counter.
Place the sponge in the second, top drawer to the right of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean sponge in the drawer.

high_descs: Move over to the far right side of the bathtub.
Pick up the sponge that is on the ledge of the tub.
Turn around completely to face the bathroom sink.
Rinse the sponge off in the sink before taking it back out.
Turn to the right and walk up to the bathroom counter.
Place the sponge in the second upper drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean sponge in a bathroom drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and take a small step to your right then walk to the wall and turn left.
Pick up the sponge that's in front of you to the right of the green curtain on the tub's lip.
Turn around to face the sink please.
Get the sponge wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Turn right and walk to the drawers stopping about three feet from them.
Open the third drawer from the right on the top row and put the sponge in there before closing the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet sponge in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the bathtub.
Pick up the sponge on the bathtub.
Turn and go to the sink.
Wash the sponge in the sink.
Turn and go to the chest of drawers.
Put the sponge in a drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed sponge in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the chest of drawers.
Pick up the green sponge from the chest.
Turn around, move to the left and face the tub.
Place the green sponge in to the tub.
Turn around, go to the right, and face the toilet.
Pick the sponge up off of the toilet.
Turn around and walk back to the tub.
Place the green sponge next to the other green sponge in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place both spunges into the tub.

high_descs: turn right, walk across room to the toilet
pick up toilet paper roll from the back of the toilet
turn left to face the wall
put the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder
tasks.task_desc: put toilet paper roll on the holder

high_descs: Turn right, and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper.
Turn left and face the toilet paper holder.
Put the toilet paper on the holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the holder.

high_descs: Turn right, walk away from the door to the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper on top of the toilet next to the sponge.
turn to your left facing the toilet paper holder.
Place the roll of toilet paper onto the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put the toilet paper roll on the holder.

high_descs: walk over to the toilet
pick up the toilet paper from the back of the toilet
turn left to approach the toilet paper holder
put the toilet paper on the holder
tasks.task_desc: take the toilet paper from the back of the toilet and place it on the toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Turn left and hang a right at the wall to reach the white toilet ahead.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper to the left of the spray bottle on the toilet tank.
Turn left to face the bar of the wooden toilet paper holder on the wall.
Put the roll of toilet paper on the bar of the wooden toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Place a roll of toilet paper on a wooden holder.

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk to the end of the room, turn right at the wall and go to the toilet.
Place the toilet paper roll on the back of the toilet.
Turn to the toilet paper holder, on the wall, to your right.
Place the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper dispenser, hanging on the wall.
tasks.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper dispenser.

high_descs: turn right and head towards the shelf
pick up the paper box from the top of the cupboard
turn around and head towards the bin
trash the paper box
tasks.task_desc: place a paper box in the trash can

high_descs: Take a step forward then turn right and walk to the counter.
Pick up the box of tissues.
Turn left and take a step then turn left and walk to the garbage.
Put the tissues in the garbage.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues in the garbage.

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk up to the bathroom counter.
Pick up the box of tissue that is sitting on the counter.
Turn around and walk over to the waste bin that is to the right of the bathroom sink.
Place the box of tissue in the waste bin.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box of tissue to the waste bin.

high_descs: Move to the far right side of the counter that is to the right of the toilet
Pick up the tissue box on the far right side of the counter
Carry the tissue box to the trash bin to the right of the sink
Place the tissues in the trash bin
tasks.task_desc: Move tissues to the trash bin

high_descs: Turn around, head to the counter
Take the box of tissues off the counter
Head to the left to the door
Put the box of tissues in the trash
tasks.task_desc: Put the tissue box in the trash

high_descs: Turn around and go to stand in front of the white cabinet towards the right side
Pick up the tissues on the right side.
Go left and then left again to stand in front of the trash can to the right of the sink.
Put the tissues in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put tissues in the trash can.

high_descs: Walk forward to the tub.
Pick up the sponge in the tub.
Turn around and veer left to the sink.
Wash the sponge in the sink.
Turn around a veer right to the tub.
Put the sponge in the tub to the left of the red rag.
tasks.task_desc: Place a washed sponge in a tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathtub.
Pick up a sponge from the bathtub.
Turn around and walk to the sink on your right.
Clean the sponge in the sink, then pick it up again.
Turn around and walk back to the bathtub.
Place the sponge in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cleaned sponge in a bathtub.

high_descs: Walk to the bathtub.
Pick up the green sponge from the bathtub.
Turn around and walk over to the sink.
Place the sponge in the sink on its side and then turn the faucet on briefly before turning it off again.
Walk back to the bathtub.
Place the sponge in the bathtub to the left of the pink rag.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet sponge inside the bathtub.

high_descs: Take a few steps to the right, and face the cabinet.
Pick up the candle stick from the back of the cabinet.
Carry the candle stick and turn to the left. Move towards the toilet, then face it on the right.
Place the candle stick on the toilet tank, to the left of the sponge.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle stick to the toilet tank.

high_descs: Walk to the right side of the counter in front of you.
Pick up the candle near the bar of soap.
Turn left and walk forward to the toilet.
Put the candle on the top of the toilet, in front of and to the left of the sponge.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Make a right to walk towards the right side of the dresser.
Pick up the candlestick in front of the soap.
Turn around to walk towards the toilet.
Set the candlestick down on the lid of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candlestick to the lid of the toilet tank.
